name: Mac & Cheese
description: Everyone needs a go-to Mac and Cheese recipe in their back pocket. Simple to make—can be done in the same time as it takes the pasta to cook. No weird ingredients and kid approved (perfect for playdates and crazy busy nights).
preparation: Cook pasta according to package directions in Multipurpose Pot. Drain and return to pot.
Stir in milk, seasoning and butter, if desired. Stir to coat.
tips: Mac attack! It's simple to customize mac & cheese your way:
Mexi Mac: Stir in prepared  Poco Picante Salsa and Guacamole.
Cha Cha Chili Mac: Stir in prepared Cha Cha Chili.
Italian Mac: Stir in 1 cup prepared Marinara Sauce, baby spinach, and artichoke hearts.
Spicy Mac: Stir in 1 tbsp Chipotle Aioli Mix.
Chicken & Peas Mac: Stir in leftover chicken and frozen green peas.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 cup steamed broccoli and 4 oz (113 g) tuna, chicken, or tofu.

products.name: Mac & Cheese Seasoning (Pack of 3)
summary: An all-time best-seller, this is the Mac & Cheese you’ve been craving – and that your kids will LOVE to eat! Creamy, cheesy, and super comforting, it’s free of unnecessary additives and packed with flavour thanks to real cheddar cheese. Take it from the stovetop (or microwave) to the table in under 10 minutes and dig in!
